title: Warm Clothes for Dhaka
description: We are collecting jackets, blankets, and sweaters for the homeless in Dhaka city to help them survive the cold weather.

title: Chittagong Winter Relief
description: Help us deliver warm clothes to vulnerable communities in Chittagong. Blankets and winter wear are especially needed.

title: Sylhet Warmth Project
description: Our aim is to distribute warm clothing to the underprivileged families in Sylhet who are suffering from the cold this winter.

title: Khulna Clothing Drive
description: Khulna's homeless population needs our help this winter. Donate your jackets, sweaters, and other warm items.

title: Barisal Winter Aid
description: Barisal faces extreme cold. Join our campaign to provide winter clothing for the poor and needy in the region.

title: Rajshahi Warm Clothing Appeal
description: Help us bring warmth to the homeless and underprivileged in Rajshahi with your donated winter clothes.

title: Rangpur Blanket Distribution
description: Rangpur is cold this winter. We are collecting blankets to help those without proper shelter and warmth.

title: Mymensingh Winter Support
description: Join our Mymensingh winter clothing campaign to support the underprivileged with blankets, sweaters, and other winter gear.

title: Comilla Warmth Initiative
description: We are focusing on helping those who lack warmth in Comilla. Donate blankets, jackets, or any warm clothes.
